channel.title: Loading MapData
channel.description:
Ok i done the tut 100% correct i run the client and get this in the cmd box
Connecting connected to update server Loading GodWars Model Cache. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 24558 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method460(Class30_Sub2_Sub4 _Sub6.java:54) at ModelDecompressor.loadModels(ModelDecompressor.jav a:19) at client.method6(client.java:8107) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:52) at client.run(client.java:5422) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) GodWars Model Cache loaded. Loading New Maps. Total of 470 Maps added onto the world map!
Get on the server and do the corrds what Coca said to do and its all white
